subject: Tennis
Computers and the Internet
Sporting Goods
lead_paragraph: At an outdoor tennis lab near the beach, a longtime pro with an interest in biomechanics has perfected the gathering of video and digital data to use it to meticulously hone a swing.
snippet: At an outdoor tennis lab near the beach, a longtime pro with an interest in biomechanics has perfected the gathering of video and digital data to use it to meticulously hone a swing.
